lines.text: One more shot like that, they'll have to pick us up in a vacuum cleaner.
Well, whatever it is, it shows there are people living here.
Maybe it's a barbeque? Boy, what I could do with a steak right now.
To the death cell with these Earth people!
lines.character: Toran, King of the Forest People

lines.text: Barin, we left you on Mongo. Are you King of the Forest People here too?
Happy, get back to Barin and Zarkov. Tell them to meet me at the temple.
I'll do it if it cracks a lung.
What brings this Earth woman here?
lines.character: Toran, King of the Forest People

lines.text: She is an Earth woman in body only, mighty Toran. Her mind belongs to the god Kalu.
Ah... she has stood in the Incense of Forgetfulness?
lines.character: Toran, King of the Forest People

lines.text: I'm sorry to have to rough you up, Ming, but I needed that black sapphire.
